name: levenshtein-edit-distance
description: Levenshtein edit distance. No cruft. Real fast.
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: npm run test-coveralls && npm run test-cli
scripts.test: npm run test-api && npm run test-cli
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-style
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run test-coverage
scripts.install-benchmark: npm install natural fast-levenshtein levenshtein levenshtein-component levenshtein-deltas leven
